attributes.action: In plane English tell me why you still have not been able to create more work in the Construction Industry, for British workers rather than foreign workers working here
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: You said british jobs for British people... why are we still waiting for you to do this.... All you ever do is excuses and lies and never do what you say you are going to do. British people shpould come first but it seems under your leadership if you are foreign you can get a job, or benefits before and more so than British people why is that????
